Articles.Content: In advance, I apologize if you can't have that sort of stuff here.

i'm guessing this is in response to the thread I made that was locked.... in which not one case was the practical point of the question addressed....

Is 3% enough for one to check a race when it asks one to "check all that apply"?

Of course, I do think this is a good example of why the whole system is stupid.
Sorry, politics is not permitted here. Closed.
